content: say merry christmas with the soft homemade touch of this crochet garland stitched in shades of caron simply soft letters are worked in single_crochet using basic increases and decreases with a single_crochet border around the outside edges make your letters using any colors that agree with your festive decor display it over the mantle or wrap it around your tree it s a conversation starter that always brings good cheer materials caron® simply soft™ 6 oz/170 g 315 yds/288 m contrast a chartreuse 39771 1 ball or 82 yds/75 m contrast b fuchsia 39764 1 ball or 101 yds/92 m contrast c cool green 39770 1 ball or 110 yds/101 m contrast d robin s egg 39780 1 ball or 79 yds/72 m contrast e gold 39782 1 ball or 79 yds/72 m contrast f harvest red 39763 1 ball or 101 yds/92 m measurements each letter = approx 5½ 14 cm tall merry = 50 127 cm long christmas = 60 152 5 cm long
